性别酷儿 Genderqueer is most commonly used to describe a person who feels that his/her gender identity does not fit into the socially constructed "norms" associated with his/her biological sex. Genderqueer is an identity that falls anywhere between man/boy/male and woman/girl/female on the spectrum of gender identities. Mary doesn't feel that s/he fits the mold of any one particular gender; therefore, Mary identifies as genderqueer.
